ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_repsf | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( S repeatS N ) : ( 0 ..^ N ) --> V ) |
| 2 |  | #P_iswrdi | |- ( ( S repeatS N ) : ( 0 ..^ N ) --> V -> ( S repeatS N ) e. Word V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( S repeatS N ) e. Word V ) |
